list_definition.definition: to give time and attention to gaining knowledge of a subject

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is studying for a degree in mathematics
She’s studying to be a teacher.

list_definition.definition: to look at or examine carefully

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Give yourself time to study the problem in detail.

list_definition.mean_english: sự học tập, sự nghiên cứu
list_definition.definition: the act of devoting time and attention to gaining knowledge

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spends all his evenings in study
She has made a study of the habits of bees.
a book of studies for the piano
The picture was entitled ‘Study in Grey’.

list_definition.definition: a room in a house etc, in which to study, read, write etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The headmaster wants to speak to the senior pupils in his study.
